### Tender Description
The Government of Canada seeks proposals for the procurement of valves components as outlined in the attached document. The items required include:

* 4 units of Valve Core (Part No.: 302-DD or 302-DD-1), Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* 26 units of Flow Restrictor (Part No.: 9-2307-1341-1 1-4 IN), Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* 22 units of Flow Restrictor (Part No.: 9-2307-1341-1 1-4 IN), Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* 7 units of Valve, Tee (Part No.: 12413-GV-1A), Unit of Issue: AY to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* 18 units of Valve, Tee (Part No.: 12413-GV-1A), Unit
